name: Xiamen
title: Xiamen - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Xiamen is a coastal city in Fujian Province, known for its pleasant climate, beautiful beaches, and colonial architecture. Famous for Gulangyu Island, a pedestrian-only island with historic buildings and scenic views, Xiamen offers a relaxing and culturally rich travel experience.

highlights.attractions: Gulangyu Island, Nanputuo Temple, Xiamen University, Huandao Road
highlights.cuisine: Seafood, Satay Noodles, Oyster Omelette, Spring Rolls
highlights.bestTime: Year-round destination, best in Spring and Autumn with mild weather

dishes.name: Satay Noodles
dishes.description: Local specialty with noodles in rich satay soup, served with various toppings.

dishes.name: Oyster Omelette
dishes.description: Popular street food with fresh oysters, eggs, and sweet potato starch.

dishes.name: Xiamen Spring Rolls
dishes.description: Delicate spring rolls with various fillings, a traditional local snack.

foodStreets.name: Zhongshan Road
foodStreets.description: Popular pedestrian street with local snacks and restaurants.

foodStreets.name: Taiwan Snack Street
foodStreets.description: Food street with Taiwanese specialties and local cuisine.

gettingThere: By Air: Xiamen Gaoqi International Airport (XMN) with domestic and international flights
By Train: High-speed rail connects Xiamen to major cities including Shanghai and Shenzhen
By Bus: Long-distance bus services from neighboring provinces
gettingAround: Ferry: Regular ferry services to Gulangyu Island
Bicycle: Popular for exploring Huandao Road and coastal areas

activities: Morning: Take ferry to Gulangyu Island and explore its historic architecture
Afternoon: Visit Sunlight Rock for panoramic views
Evening: Enjoy fresh seafood dinner on the island
Morning: Visit Nanputuo Temple and Xiamen University campus
Afternoon: Cycle along Huandao Road and enjoy coastal views
Evening: Explore Zhongshan Road pedestrian street
Morning: Visit local markets and try traditional snacks
Afternoon: Explore Jimei School Village and its unique architecture
Evening: Experience Xiamen's night life and food culture
